results.title: AI助手加速开发流程
results.summary: 用户报告使用AI助手在创建全栈应用、文案和游戏开发中显著节省时间，尽管它还不是完美的替代品。

pain_points.text: AI助手未能完全替代创意工作和核心逻辑开发

opportunities.text: 为早期创业公司和独立开发者提供快速原型开发和支持

mvp_plan.goal: 在一周内实现针对特定开发任务的AI辅助工具，以验证市场需求和产品可行性

top_mentions.author: dev_guru
top_mentions.text: Just tried an AI agent to build a full-stack app. It's not perfect, but it finished 80% of the boilerplate. The future is here.

top_mentions.author: startup_founder
top_mentions.text: We used an AI agent to generate our landing page copy and initial user onboarding flow. Saved us about a week of work. Highly recommend for early-stage startups.

top_mentions.author: hobby_coder
top_mentions.text: I built a small game using an AI agent assistant. It was great for finding bugs and writing tests, but the core game logic still needed my creative input. It's a collaborator, not a replacement.

results.title: AI Agents: Hype or the Future of Productivity?
results.summary: Social media discussions reveal mixed perceptions about the capabilities and potential of AI agents, with some highlighting limitations while others foresee revolutionary productivity gains.

pain_points.text: The inability of AI agents to handle complex logic and custom requirements is a major concern for users.

opportunities.text: There's a potential for a billion-dollar company by effectively leveraging AI agents to increase productivity.

mvp_plan.goal: In one week, develop a prototype AI agent that can address custom requirements to demonstrate its potential in a specific industry.

top_mentions.author: skeptic_dev
top_mentions.text: These AI agents are just fancy script runners. They can't handle complex logic or custom requirements. Still a long way to go.

top_mentions.author: vc_insights
top_mentions.text: The next billion-dollar company will be built by a founder leveraging a team of AI agents, not human employees. The productivity gains are astronomical.
